name: End of War-torn Road
description:
Tired of living inside an endless warzone, a young defenseless girl decided to travel down a dangerous road.

At the end of the road, a new beginning will awaits her...But first she need to make it to the end alive...

Can you guide her safely through the warfield and reach End of War-Torn Road?

P.S: I noticed that download is very slow / not working, so I have a alternate download link here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1OWc7iGTb9-i6N_xbtFH5RPtQYAFLlY6U?usp=sha...
